name: Volt Bolt!
description:
Volt bolt - Ultimate shocking arcade link 3 blast game!
Link up 3 or more to bash them out, link 4 or more to create epic booms with hidden bolts,
bash rains with electric shocks and multi blast functions!

2 type of game modes
Quick launch game with tons of brain teasing tasks

Match em up and complete with players from all over the world in Volt Bolt!
